title: Intimation of Repayment of Commercial Paper (CP) 13 May - Titan Company redeemed ₹1000 crore commercial papers issued on 12 March 2025 on 13 May 2025.
date: 13 May - Titan Company redeemed ₹1000 crore commercial papers issued on 12 March 2025 on 13 May 2025.

title: Resignation Of Senior Management Personnel Of The Company 13 May - CEO of Watches & Wearables Division resigns effective 12 Aug 2025 for personal reasons.
date: 13 May - CEO of Watches & Wearables Division resigns effective 12 Aug 2025 for personal reasons.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript 12 May - Titan's Q4 FY25 earnings call discusses performance, consumer trends, margins, and growth outlook.
date: 12 May - Titan's Q4 FY25 earnings call discusses performance, consumer trends, margins, and growth outlook.

title: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance 9 May - Annual Secretarial Compliance Report with minor Rs.20,000 fine for delayed record date notice submission.
date: 9 May - Annual Secretarial Compliance Report with minor Rs.20,000 fine for delayed record date notice submission.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication 9 May - Newspaper publication for Audited financial result for the fourth quarter and year ended 31st March 2025
